name: ...Toil and Trouble
description:
Search your messy room to gather materials then boil them in your cauldron to make curious potions for your responsibly-distanced clients! Remember to follow the recipe, these potions are fickle.

-- Controls --

  • WASD/Arrows/Joystick - Move
  • Space/A (Xbox)  - Pickup/Throw objects
  • Shift/X (Xbox) - Sprint

-- Social Media --

Level Assets/UI/Systems Programming by: https://twitter.com/tayusuki
